mapper.select: select * from likeStock m join predict p on m.predict_id = p.id join stock s on m.predict_id = s.id where member_id = #{memberId}
mapper.insert: insert into likeStock(member_id, predict_id) select #{memberId}, #{predictId} from dual where not exists( select member_id, predict_id from likeStock where member_id=#{memberId} and predict_id = #{predictId})
